title: Manage Autonomous Drilling Fleet
description: A control room operator oversees a fleet of autonomous drill rigs, assigning them tasks and monitoring their performance.

tasks.description: Upload a new drill pattern design to the autonomous drilling system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new pattern is loaded and ready to be assigned.

tasks.description: Assign the new drill pattern to an available autonomous drill rig (ADR-03).
tasks.expected_outcome: The drill rig receives the instruction, automatically travels to the location, and begins drilling the pattern.

tasks.description: Monitor the drill's progress and performance remotely, receiving alerts for any faults or deviations.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator supervises the drill's automated work, ensuring it completes the pattern efficiently.
